recommended_degree: Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Desain Media (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Role Description
This is an on-site internship role located in Jakarta, Indonesia for a Graphic Design Intern at WM Center. The intern will be responsible for creating visual assets for social media, marketing campaigns, and internal communication materials. The role requires an eye for detail and the ability to produce clean, modern, and consistent designs that align with WM Centerâ€™s branding.

Qualifications
Current student or recent graduate in Graphic Design, Visual Communication Design, or related field.
Proficient in design tools such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, or Canva.
Strong sense of aesthetics with the ability to deliver clean and professional design outputs.
Ability to work collaboratively in a creative team environment
Good time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.
Willing to commit to a minimum 6-month internship program (paid internship with a WFO arrangement).
